name: Flirting with Disaster
summary_text: A young man, his wife, and his incompetent case worker travel across country to find his birth parents.

name: Once Upon a Time in Venice
summary_text: A Los Angeles detective seeks out the ruthless gang that stole his dog.

name: Shoot the Piano Player
summary_text: Charlie is approached by his crook brother Chico, who is chased by two gangsters. Charlie helps him to escape, but he upsets the criminals, so when his brother Fido is kidnapped, Charlie has to take an attitude with tragic consequences.

name: Sorry We Missed You
summary_text: Hoping that self-employment through gig economy can solve their financial woes, a hard-up UK delivery driver and his wife struggling to raise a family end up trapped in the vicious circle of this modern-day form of labour exploitation.

name: Swing Vote
summary_text: In a remarkable turn-of-events, the result of the presidential election comes down to one man's vote.

name: Zulu
summary_text: Policemen Ali Sokhela and Brian Epkeen investigate the brutal murder of a young white woman, apparently provoked by the availability of a new illegal drug and somehow connected to the disappearance of black street children.

name: Rudderless
summary_text: A grieving father in a downward spiral stumbles across a box of his recently deceased son's demo tapes and lyrics. Shocked by the discovery of this unknown talent, he forms a band in the hope of finding some catharsis.

name: Police Story 2
summary_text: The Hong Kong supercop must stop a group of blackmailing bombers, while the villains of Police Story (1985) are out for revenge.

name: The Magic of Belle Isle
summary_text: Monty Wildhorn, an alcoholic novelist of Westerns, has lost his drive. His nephew pushes him to summer in quiet Belle Isle. He begrudgingly befriends a newly single mom and her 3 girls who help him find the inspiration to write again.

name: Open Water 2: Adrift
summary_text: When a group of friends fail to lower the ladder of their boat, they find themselves stranded in the surrounding waters and struggle to survive.

name: Ask Tesadüfleri Sever
summary_text: Year 1977, a September morning in Ankara... Yilmaz tries to rush his pregnant wife Neriman to the hospital and he crushes into Omer's car. This accident causes Omer's pregnant wife Inci, ...                See full summary »

name: Greystoke: The Legend of Tarzan, Lord of the Apes
summary_text: A missing heir of respected Scottish family, raised in African jungles by animals, finally returns to his estate only to realize that difference between the two worlds is really significant.

name: Woman in the Dunes
summary_text: An entomologist on vacation is trapped by local villagers into living with a woman whose life task is shoveling sand for them.

name: Unicorn Store
summary_text: Kit, a twenty-something dreamer, receives an invitation that would fulfill her childhood dreams.

name: Blue Thunder
summary_text: The cop test pilot for an experimental police helicopter learns the sinister implications of the new vehicle.

name: The Eiger Sanction
summary_text: Classical art professor and collector Dr. Jonathan Hemlock, who doubles as a professional assassin, is coerced out of retirement to avenge the murder of an old friend.

name: Lord of the Flies
summary_text: Schoolboys marooned on a Pacific island create their own savage civilization.

name: Dr. T & the Women
summary_text: A wealthy gynecologist's ideal life is thrown into turmoil when the women closest to him begin to affect his life in unexpecting ways.

name: Flame & Citron
summary_text: A drama centered on two fighters in the Holger Danske World War II resistance group.

name: Naked
summary_text: Nervous about finally getting married, a guy is forced to relive the same nerve-wracking hours over and over again until he gets things right on his wedding day.

name: The Reef
summary_text: A great white shark hunts the crew of a capsized sailboat along the Great Barrier Reef.

name: Summer School
summary_text: Freddy the gym teacher has to teach remedial English in summer (high) school, if he wants tenure. As he can only teach gym and his students want fun, emphasis is on "field trips" - until he's fired unless all his students pass the test.

name: The Big Bounce
summary_text: A small-time con artist and a Hawaiian real estate developer's mischevious, enterprising mistress team up for a potential $200,000 score.

name: Jeepers Creepers III
summary_text: Sheriff Dan Tashtego and a team of creeper hunters enlist the help of officer Davis Tubbs to help stop the monster's eating spree.
A scientist invents a time machine, which leads to a bitter battle between his evil twin brother and his son.

name: Any Which Way You Can
summary_text: A trucker turned prize fighter, his brother and their pet orangutan have a series of misadventures involving the mob, corrupt cops, motorcycle gangs and pretty dames.

name: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Movie
summary_text: Mike Nelson and his robot companions watch and give their comments about This Island Earth (1955).

name: Comet
summary_text: Set in a parallel universe, Comet bounces back and forth over the course of an unlikely but perfectly paired couple's six-year relationship.

name: The Son's Room
summary_text: A psychoanalyst and his family go through profound emotional trauma when their son dies in a scuba diving accident.

name: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
summary_text: While recovering from an assassination attempt four days before his coronation, a stern prince is replaced by a romantic lookalike.

name: Brother
summary_text: An ex-soldier with a personal honor code enters the family crime business in St. Petersburg, Russia.

name: Saving Grace
summary_text: A small-town English widow, facing financial troubles after her husband's suicide, turns to agriculture of an illegal kind.

name: Miss You Already
summary_text: The friendship between two life-long girlfriends is put to the test when one starts a family and the other falls ill.

name: The Assistant
summary_text: A searing look at a day in the life of an assistant to a powerful executive. As Jane follows her daily routine, she grows increasingly aware of the insidious abuse that threatens every aspect of her position.

name: Top Hat
summary_text: An American dancer comes to Britain and falls for a model whom he initially annoyed, but she mistakes him for his goofy producer.

name: Zombie Strippers!
summary_text: A zombie epidemic spreads throughout a strip club in Nebraska.

name: Airport
summary_text: A bomber on board an airplane, an airport almost closed by snow, and various personal problems of the people involved.

name: The Prince
summary_text: When his daughter is kidnapped, a retired assassin is drawn back into the life he gave up. To rescue her, he must confront his former rival.

name: Grand Piano
summary_text: A pianist with stage fright endures a performance under the eyes of a mysterious sniper, who will shoot and kill him if a wrong note is played.

name: The Goldfinch
summary_text: A boy in New York is taken in by a wealthy family after his mother is killed in a bombing at the Metropolitan Museum of Art. In a rush of panic, he steals 'The Goldfinch', a painting that eventually draws him into a world of crime.

name: Coma
summary_text: When a young female doctor notices an unnatural amount of comas occurring in her hospital she uncovers a horrible conspiracy.

name: Premam
summary_text: A young man has three opportunities to find love. Will the third time be the charm?

name: A Taxi Driver
summary_text: A widowed father and taxi driver who drives a German reporter from Seoul to Gwangju to cover the 1980 uprising, soon finds himself regretting his decision after being caught in the violence around him.

name: Grand Hotel
summary_text: A group of very different individuals staying at a luxurious hotel in Berlin deal with each of their respective dramas.

name: Experimenter
summary_text: In 1961, famed social psychologist Stanley Milgram conducted a series of radical behavior experiments that tested ordinary humans' willingness to obey authority.

name: Department Q: A Conspiracy of Faith
summary_text: Two intertwined cases linking the past with the present will require the aid of Department Q to catch an elusive serial killer, while time is running out.

name: The Grudge 3
summary_text: A young Japanese woman who holds the key to stopping the evil spirit of Kayako, travels to the haunted Chicago apartment from the sequel, to stop the curse of Kayako once and for all.

name: Irma la Douce
summary_text: A policeman falls in love with a prostitute, Irma, but doesn't want her seeing other men. So he creates an alter-ego, a wealthy Englishman who will be her only customer. Seems like a solid enough plan - what could possibly go wrong?

name: Son in Law
summary_text: Having gotten a taste of college life, a drastically changed farm girl returns home for Thanksgiving break with her best friend, a flamboyant party animal who is clearly a fish out of water in a small farm town.

name: The Hidden
summary_text: A cop and an FBI agent race for answers after law abiding people suddenly become violent criminals.

name: Black and Blue
summary_text: A rookie New Orleans police officer is forced to balance her identity as a black woman after she witnesses two corrupt cops committing murder.

name: Appleseed
summary_text: In a utopian society created at the end of the third world war, a female warrior who has been plucked from the badlands begins to see cracks in this new facade. And what does this community have planned for the rest of humankind?

name: Willard
summary_text: A young man with an unusual connection to rats uses them at his own sociopathic will.

name: Wazir
summary_text: A grief-stricken cop and an amputee grandmaster are brought together by a peculiar twist of fate as part of a wider conspiracy that has darkened their lives.

name: Human Nature
summary_text: A woman is in love with a man in love with another woman, and all three have designs on a young man raised as an ape.

name: Tomcats
summary_text: At the wedding of a friend, the remaining bachelors bet on staying single. 7 years later, one of the 2 remaining loses $51000 in Vegas. He must get the other guy married to cash in and pay his debt or die. A cute woman helps him.

name: The Devil's Candy
summary_text: A struggling painter's possessed by dark forces after he and his young family move into their dream home in rural Texas, in this creepy haunted-house tale.

name: Ramona and Beezus
summary_text: An adventurous young girl uses her imagination to escape her reality, that is quickly spinning out of reach.

name: Chinese Take-Out
summary_text: A well-ordered hardware store owner in Buenos Aires will see his life turn upside down when he helps a stranded Chinese man who doesn't speak a word of Spanish find his uncle in the bustling city. But can this coexistence bear fruit?

name: Shadowlands
summary_text: C.S. Lewis, a world-renowned Christian theologian, writer and professor, leads a passionless life until he meets spirited poet Joy Gresham from the U.S.

name: The Misfits
summary_text: A divorcée falls for an over-the-hill cowboy who is struggling to maintain his romantically independent lifestyle.

name: What's Love Got to Do with It
summary_text: The story of singer Tina Turner's rise to stardom and how she gained the courage to break free from her abusive husband, Ike Turner.

name: Made
summary_text: Two aspiring boxers, lifelong friends, get involved in a money-laundering scheme through a low-level organized crime group.

name: The Corruptor
summary_text: With the aid from a New York City policeman, a top immigrant cop tries to stop drug-trafficking and corruption by immigrant Chinese Triads, but things get complicated when the Triads try to bribe the policeman.

name: Sputnik
summary_text: The lone survivor of an enigmatic spaceship incident hasn't returned back home alone-hiding inside his body is a dangerous creature.

name: Death Warrant
summary_text: In a violent and corrupt prison, decorated cop Louis Burke must infiltrate the jail to find answers to a number of inside murders. What he finds is a struggle of life and death tied in to his own past.

name: Le concert
summary_text: Thirty years ago Bolshoi Orchestra conductor Andreï Filipov was fired for hiring Jewish musicians. Now a lowly janitor, an opportunity arises to gather his old musicians to go and pose as the official Buolshoi orchestra in Paris.

name: Beowulf & Grendel
summary_text: In Denmark, during the 6th century, Danish king Hrothgar and his warriors kill a troll whose son, Grendel, vows revenge.

name: Fatman
summary_text: A rowdy, unorthodox Santa Claus is fighting to save his declining business. Meanwhile, Billy, a neglected and precocious 12 year old, hires a hit man to kill Santa after receiving a lump of coal in his stocking.

name: Der Schuh des Manitu
summary_text: The hilarious adventures of two best friends, Apachi Indian chief Abahachi and cowboy Ranger, in the Wild West.

name: The Congress
summary_text: An aging, out-of-work actress accepts one last job, though the consequences of her decision affect her in ways she didn't consider.

name: Game of Death
summary_text: A martial arts movie star must fake his death to find the people who are trying to kill him.

name: Quadrophenia
summary_text: Jimmy loathes his job and parents. He seeks solace with his mod clique, scooter riding and drugs, only to be disappointed.

name: The Juror
summary_text: A juror in a Mafia trial is forced to convince the other jurors to vote not guilty by an obsessive mob enforcer.

name: We Are Still Here
summary_text: In the cold, wintery fields of New England, a lonely old house wakes up every thirty years - and demands a sacrifice.

name: The Beverly Hillbillies
summary_text: A feature adaptation of the classic television show, when nice guy redneck Jed Clampett strikes it rich when he finds black oil, and moves him and his kin to posh Beverly Hills.

name: The Tigger Movie
summary_text: Tigger goes looking through the hundred-acre-wood to find his family.

name: Defending Your Life
summary_text: In an afterlife way station resembling a major city, the lives of the recently-deceased are examined in a court-like setting.

name: Ripley's Game
summary_text: A dying family man in need of money is persuaded to assassinate a European crime boss.

name: Everly
summary_text: An action/thriller centered on a kidnapped woman who faces down hitmen sent by a mob boss/her captor while trying to protect her family from his wrath.

name: Anbe Sivam
summary_text: Two men, one young and arrogant, the other damaged - physically but not spiritually - by life, are thrown together by circumstances, and find that they are in some ways bound together by fate.

name: Little Black Book
summary_text: A woman snoops through her boyfriend's palm pilot and reveals his former girlfriends, which causes her to question why they're still listed in his little black book.

name: Miracle in Cell No. 7
summary_text: A story about the love between a mentally-ill father and his lovingly adorable daughter.

name: Bilal: A New Breed of Hero
summary_text: A thousand years ago, one boy with a dream of becoming a great warrior is abducted with his sister and taken to a land far away from home. Thrown into a world where greed and injustice rule all, Bilal finds the courage to raise his voice and make a change. Inspired by true events, this is a story of a real hero who earned his remembrance in time and history.

name: Country Strong
summary_text: A rising country-music songwriter works with a fallen star to work their way to fame, causing romantic complications along the way.

name: Guzaarish
summary_text: Ethan, a magician rendered paralyzed in an accident, sets off a furor when he makes a petition to the court to end his own life.

name: Never Look Away
summary_text: German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the GDR-regime.

name: Restless
summary_text: The story of a terminally ill teenage girl who falls for a boy who likes to attend funerals and their encounters with the ghost of a Japanese kamikaze pilot from WWII.

name: Barefoot in the Park
summary_text: Paul, a conservative young lawyer, marries the vivacious Corie. Their highly passionate relationship descends into comical discord in a five-flight New York City walk-up apartment.

name: Wong Fei Hung
summary_text: Late 1800s Foshan, Guangdong: Wong Fei Hung/Jet Li trains men in martial arts to help defend against foreign powers already holding Hong Kong and Macau. He looks after cute 13th Aunt, who's just returned from England. Lots of fight scenes.

name: Clear History
summary_text: A disgraced former marketing executive plots revenge against his former boss, who made billions from the electric car company they had started together.

name: Cold Prey
summary_text: 5 young Norwegians head up to the mountains to snowboard. One breaks his leg and it's getting dark soon, so they spend the night in a big, abandoned hotel, closed 30 years ago. They are not alone.

name: Help!
summary_text: Sir Ringo Starr finds himself the human sacrifice target of a cult, and his fellow members of The Beatles must try to protect him from it.

name: The Party
summary_text: Janet (Dame Kristin Scott Thomas) hosts a party to celebrate her new promotion, but once the guests arrive, it becomes clear that not everything is going to go down as smoothly as the red wine.

name: Life of Crime
summary_text: Two common criminals get more than they bargained for after kidnapping the wife of a corrupt real-estate developer who shows no interest in paying the $1 million dollar ransom for her safe return.

name: Noelle
summary_text: Santa's daughter must take over the family business when her father retires and her brother, who is supposed to inherit the Santa role, gets cold feet.

name: The Snowtown Murders
summary_text: Based on true events, 16 year-old Jamie falls in with his mother's new boyfriend and his crowd of self-appointed neighborhood watchmen, a relationship that leads to a spree of torture and murder.

name: Thursday
summary_text: A former L.A. drug dealer has moved to Houston to make a new life for himself as a married architect. Everything falls apart when he is suddenly visited by one of his former cohorts who comes carrying heroin.

name: War on Everyone
summary_text: Two corrupt cops set out to blackmail and frame every criminal unfortunate enough to cross their path. Events, however, are complicated by the arrival of someone who appears to be even more dangerous than they are.

name: Poison Ivy
summary_text: A seductive teen befriends an introverted high school student and schemes her way into the lives of her wealthy family.

name: Chocolate
summary_text: An autistic girl with powerful martial art skills looks to settle her ailing mother's debts by seeking out the ruthless gangs that owe her family money.

name: The Kentucky Fried Movie
summary_text: A series of short, highly irreverent, and often tasteless skits.

name: Kabhi Haan Kabhi Naa
summary_text: A dreamer falls for a girl who is in love with someone else and tries to create a rift between her and the man she loves.

name: The Longest Yard
summary_text: A sadistic warden asks a former pro quarterback, now serving time in his prison, to put together a team of inmates to take on (and get pummeled by) the guards.

name: Kairo
summary_text: Two groups of people discover evidence that suggests spirits may be trying to invade the human world through the Internet.

name: The Chase
summary_text: Escaped convict Jack Hammond takes a woman hostage and sets off for the Mexican border with the police hot on his tail.

name: Swallow
summary_text: Hunter, a newly pregnant housewife, finds herself increasingly compelled to consume dangerous objects. As her husband and his family tighten their control over her life, she must confront the dark secret behind her new obsession.

name: The Young and Prodigious T.S. Spivet
summary_text: A ten-year-old scientist secretly leaves his family's ranch in Montana where he lives with his cowboy father and scientist mother, escapes home, and travels across the country aboard a freight train to receive an award at the Smithsonian Institute.

name: Battlestar Galactica: Blood & Chrome
summary_text: The adventures of young William Adama in the First Cylon War.

name: Hercules in New York
summary_text: Hercules is sent to Earth where he finds true love and starts a promising career in the bodybuilder business.

name: Iris
summary_text: True story of the lifelong romance between novelist Iris Murdoch and her husband John Bayley, from their student days through her battle with Alzheimer's disease.

name: New York Stories
summary_text: A middle-aged artist obsessed with his pretty young assistant, a precocious 12 year old living in a hotel, and a neurotic lawyer with a possessive mother make up three Gotham tales.

name: Phantom of the Paradise
summary_text: A disfigured composer sells his soul for the woman he loves so that she will perform his music. However, an evil record tycoon betrays him and steals his music to open his rock palace, The Paradise.

name: The Man Who Knew Too Much
summary_text: An ordinary British couple vacationing in Switzerland suddenly find themselves embroiled in a case of international intrigue when their daughter is kidnapped by spies plotting a political assassination.

name: The Getaway
summary_text: An ex-con and his devoted wife must flee from danger when a heist doesn't go as planned.

name: Lost River
summary_text: A single mother is swept into a dark underworld, while her teenage son discovers a road that leads him to a secret underwater town.

name: Jungle Fever
summary_text: Friends and family of a married black architect react in different ways to his affair with an Italian secretary.

name: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
summary_text: The Chipmunks believe that Dave plans to propose to his new girlfriend in Miami.--and dump them. They have three days to get to him and save themselves not only from losing Dave but also from gaining a terrible stepbrother.

name: A Passage to India
summary_text: Cultural mistrust and false accusations doom a friendship in British colonial India between an Indian doctor, an Englishwoman engaged to marry a city magistrate, and an English educator.

name: The Children
summary_text: A relaxing Christmas vacation turns into a terrifying fight for survival as the children begin to turn on their parents.

name: Prozac Nation
summary_text: A young woman struggles with depression during her first year at Harvard.

name: Fantastic Voyage
summary_text: A scientist is nearly assassinated. In order to save him, a submarine is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into his bloodstream with a small crew. Problems arise almost as soon as they enter it.

name: Killing Me Softly
summary_text: A woman faces deadly consequences for abandoning her loving relationship with her boyfriend to pursue exciting sexual scenarios with a mysterious celebrity mountaineer.

name: Free Willy 2: The Adventure Home
summary_text: Teenager Jesse becomes reunited with Willy two years after the whale's jump to freedom as the teenager tries to rescue the killer whale and other orcas from an oil spill.

name: Last Shift
summary_text: A rookie cop's 1st shift alone in the last night of a closing police station turns into a living nightmare.

name: Grabbers
summary_text: When an island off the coast of Ireland is invaded by bloodsucking aliens, the heroes discover that getting drunk is the only way to survive.

name: Blood and Chocolate
summary_text: A teenage werewolf is torn between honoring her family's secret and her love for a man.

name: It's the Great Pumpkin, Charlie Brown
summary_text: The Peanuts gang celebrates Halloween while Linus waits for the Great Pumpkin.

name: The Sacrament
summary_text: A news team trails a man as he travels into the world of Eden Parish to find his missing sister, where it becomes apparent that this paradise may not be as it seems.

name: Dagon
summary_text: A boating accident runs a young man and woman ashore in a decrepit Spanish fishing town which they discover is in the grips of an ancient sea god and its monstrous half human offspring.

name: A Christmas Prince
summary_text: When a reporter goes undercover as a tutor to get the inside scoop on a playboy prince, she gets tangled in some royal intrigue and ends up finding love - but will she be able to keep up her lie?

name: The Other Side of the Door
summary_text: After her young son is killed in a tragic accident, a woman learns of a ritual which will bring him back to say goodbye, but when she disobeys a sacred warning, she upsets the balance between life and death.

name: A Private War
summary_text: One of the most celebrated war correspondents of our time, Marie Colvin is an utterly fearless and rebellious spirit, driven to the frontline of conflicts across the globe to give voice to the voiceless.

name: The Adventures of Ford Fairlane
summary_text: A vulgar private detective is hired to find a missing groupie and is drawn into a mystery involving a series of murders tied to the music industry.

name: Keinohrhasen
summary_text: Rainbow press reporter Ludo is sentenced to 8 months, but is released on probation. But he has to work 300 hours for a local daycare center and meets Anna who has unfinished business with him.

name: Absentia
summary_text: A woman and her sister begin to link a mysterious tunnel to a series of disappearances, including that of her own husband.

name: East Is East
summary_text: In early 1970s England, a Pakistani father finds the authority he has previously maintained challenged by his increasingly Anglicized children.

name: Moby Dick
summary_text: The sole survivor of a lost whaling ship relates the tale of his captain's self-destructive obsession to hunt the white whale, Moby Dick.

name: Newton
summary_text: A government clerk on election duty in the conflict ridden jungle of Central India tries his best to conduct free and fair voting despite the apathy of security forces and the looming fear of guerrilla attacks by communist rebels.

name: In the Electric Mist
summary_text: A detective in post-Katrina New Orleans has a series of surreal encounters with a troop of ghostly Confederate soldiers while investigating serial killings of local prostitutes, a 1965 lynching, and corrupt local businessmen.

name: Thani Oruvan
summary_text: Siddharth Abimanyu, an influential scientist, is involved in various illegal medical practices. Mithran, an efficient IPS officer, decides to expose him.

name: Poltergeist III
summary_text: Carol Anne is staying with her aunt in a high-rise building, where the supernatural forces haunting her make their return.

name: Extreme Measures
summary_text: A young doctor confronts a famous colleague when he learns about the true methods of his work.

name: Supernova
summary_text: A deep space rescue and recovery spaceship with a crew of 6 receives a distress call from a mining operation 3432 light years away. A rescue operation via dimension jump is made. Bad idea.

name: An American Pickle
summary_text: An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn.

name: Southbound
summary_text: Five interlocking tales of terror follow the fates of a group of weary travellers who confront their worst nightmares - and darkest secrets - over one long night on a desolate stretch of desert highway.

name: Stand and Deliver
summary_text: The story of Jaime Escalante, a high school teacher who successfully inspired his dropout-prone students to learn calculus.

name: Chaos Walking
summary_text: Two unlikely companions embark on a perilous adventure through the badlands of an unexplored planet as they try to escape a dangerous and disorienting reality, where all inner thoughts are seen and heard by everyone.

name: The Spirit of the Beehive
summary_text: In 1940, after watching and being traumatized by the movie Frankenstein (1931), a sensitive seven year-old girl living in a small Spanish village drifts into her own fantasy world.

name: Rocco and His Brothers
summary_text: Having recently been uprooted to Milan, Rocco and his four brothers each look for a new way in life when a prostitute comes between Rocco and his brother Simone.

name: I Could Never Be Your Woman
summary_text: A mother falls for a younger man while her daughter falls in love for the first time. Mother Nature messes with their fates.

name: Red Beard
summary_text: In 19th-century Japan, a rough-tempered yet charitable town doctor trains a young intern.

name: Management
summary_text: A traveling art saleswoman tries to shake off a flaky motel manager who falls for her and won't leave her alone.

name: The Lazarus Project
summary_text: A former criminal is drawn into a criminal endeavor and subsequently finds himself living an inexplicable new life working at a psychiatric facility.

name: Where the Truth Lies
summary_text: Karen O'Connor, a young journalist known for her celebrity profiles, is consumed with discovering the truth behind a long-buried incident that affected the lives and careers of showbiz team Vince Collins and Lanny Morris.

name: Charlotte's Web
summary_text: Wilbur is a farm pig who's terrified that he'll end up on the dinner table. His friend Charlotte, a charming spider, comes to his rescue. She weaves words into her web, convincing the farmer that Wilbur is too special a pig to kill.

name: Shaft
summary_text: Cool black private eye John Shaft is hired by a crime lord to find and retrieve his kidnapped daughter.

name: Monsieur Hulot's Holiday
summary_text: Monsieur Hulot comes to a beachside hotel for a vacation and accidentally, but good-naturedly, causes havoc.

name: Zombeavers
summary_text: A fun weekend turns into madness and horror for a bunch of groupies looking for fun in a beaver infested swamp.

name: 7 Days in Hell
summary_text: A fictional documentary-style expose on the rivalry between two of the greatest tennis players of all-time who battled it out in a 2001 match that lasted seven days.

name: Storytelling
summary_text: College and high school serve as the backdrop for two stories about dysfunction and personal turmoil.

name: Phoenix
summary_text: A disfigured Holocaust survivor sets out to determine if the man she loved betrayed her trust.

name: A Pigeon Sat on a Branch Reflecting on Existence
summary_text: Sam and Jonathan, a pair of hapless novelty salesmen, embark on a tour of the human condition in reality and fantasy that unfold in a series of absurdist episodes.

name: Snabba Cash
summary_text: When JW becomes a drug runner in order to maintain his double life, his fate becomes tied to two other men: Jorge, a fugitive on the run from both the Serbian mafia and the police, and mafia enforcer Mrado, who is on the hunt for Jorge.

name: Latter Days
summary_text: A promiscuous gay party animal falls for a young Mormon missionary, leading to crisis, cliché, and catastrophe.

name: Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam
summary_text: Nandini has to choose between Sameer, the man who taught her to fall in love; and Vanraj, the man from whom she learnt how to abide and fulfill promises of love.

name: Jai Ho
summary_text: An upright ex-army man, Jai fights a solitary war against corruption and injustice. With a simple mantra to pay forward, he starts off by helping one person and forms an ever growing circle of people helping each other.

name: Tucker: The Man and His Dream
summary_text: The story of Preston Tucker, the maverick car designer and his ill-fated challenge to the auto industry with his revolutionary car concept.

name: All of Me
summary_text: A dying millionaire has her soul transferred into a younger, willing woman. However, something goes wrong, and she finds herself in her lawyer's body - together with the lawyer.

name: Moxie
summary_text: Inspired by her mom's rebellious past and a confident new friend, a shy 16-year-old publishes an anonymous zine calling out sexism at her school.

name: Como agua para chocolate
summary_text: When tradition prevents her from marrying the man she loves, a young woman discovers she has a unique talent for cooking.

name: Bangalore Days
summary_text: A fun roller coaster ride about three young people, Aju, Divya and Kuttan who are cousins, reach Bangalore to dream, discover and explore.

name: Winchester '73
summary_text: A cowboy's obsession with a stolen rifle leads to a bullet-ridden odyssey through the American West.

name: Kiss of Death
summary_text: A reformed convict goes undercover with the help of an angry detective to ensnare a psychotic mobster.

name: Anywhere But Here
summary_text: A mother and daughter search for success in Beverly Hills.

name: One Missed Call
summary_text: People mysteriously start receiving voicemail messages from their future selves, foretelling their deaths.

name: The Order
summary_text: A young priest is sent to Rome to investigate the troubling death of the head of his order.

name: Baadshah
summary_text: A small time detective is mistaken as a CBI agent and gets embroiled in a deadly mission to save the Chief Minister from an assassination attempt.

name: Red Dog
summary_text: Based on the legendary true story of the Red Dog who united a disparate local community while roaming the Australian outback in search of his long lost master.

name: Mou gaan dou II
summary_text: In this prequel to Mou gaan dou (2002), Chan Wing Yan has just become an undercover cop in the triads while Lau Kin Ming joins the police force. Both the triads and the police find an enemy in a rival crime boss.

name: Teen Titans GO! To the Movies
summary_text: A villain's maniacal plan for world domination sidetracks five teenage superheroes who dream of Hollywood stardom.

name: Living in Oblivion
summary_text: This ultimate tribute to all independent filmmakers takes place during one day on the set of a non-budget movie.

name: Coal Miner's Daughter
summary_text: The life of legendary Loretta Lynn, the dirt poor Appalachian Mountains girl who rose from humble beginnings to become the "Queen of Country Music."

name: Honeymoon in Vegas
summary_text: Jack loses $65,000 in poker in Las Vegas, where he's marrying Betsy. The wedding will have to wait as the poker winner wants the weekend with Betsy to cancel the debt. She accepts. Whom will she marry?

name: The Phantom of the Opera
summary_text: A mad, disfigured composer seeks love with a lovely young opera singer.

name: Adult World
summary_text: A naive college graduate, Amy, who believes she's destined to be a great poet, begrudgingly accepts a job in a shop while she pursues a mentorship with reclusive writer Rat Billings.

name: French Connection II
summary_text: "Popeye" Doyle travels to Marseille to find Alain Charnier, the drug smuggler who eluded him in New York.

name: Brittany Runs a Marathon
summary_text: A young woman decides to make positive changes in her life by training for the New York City Marathon.

name: Revenge
summary_text: A retired US Navy pilot comes to Mexico, where he falls in love with the wife of a powerful businessman. The consequences will be cruel and unforeseen.

name: Dobermann
summary_text: Dobermann is the world's most ruthless bank robber and with his gang rob bank after bank, now in Paris. What can the police do but to let the mad, morally bankrupt police commissioner loose on him?

name: Capone
summary_text: The 47-year old Al Capone, after 10 years in prison, starts suffering from dementia and comes to be haunted by his violent past.

name: Kurtlar Vadisi: Irak
summary_text: The film covers through fiction real-life events like the occupation of Iraq, the execution of Daniel Pearl, the Hood event and the Abu Ghraib torture scandal.

name: Camp Rock 2: The Final Jam
summary_text: Mitchie is back with her friends at Camp Rock, ready to perform music, dance and have a good time. Her "boyfriend" is there as well. A new camp has opened across the lake, creating an atmosphere of competition or feud.

name: Franklyn
summary_text: A portrait of the broken lives of four people (a vigilante detective, a worried parent, an awkward man looking for love and a suicidal artist) as they all struggle to cope in their religiously-dystopian city.

name: Body Snatchers
summary_text: A teenage girl and her father discover alien clones are replacing humans on a remote U.S. military base in Alabama.

name: Topaz
summary_text: A French Intelligence Agent becomes embroiled in the Cold War politics first with uncovering the events leading up to the 1962 Cuban Missile Crisis, and then back to France to break up an international Russian spy ring.

name: The Presidio
summary_text: A San Francisco civilian police detective is forced to work on a series of murders with his former enemy commanding officer while dating his daughter.

name: My Friend Dahmer
summary_text: A young Jeffrey Dahmer struggles to belong in high school.

name: Roger Dodger
summary_text: After breaking up with his lover and boss, a smooth-talking man takes his teenaged nephew out on the town in search of sex.

name: Planes: Fire & Rescue
summary_text: When Dusty learns that his engine is damaged and he may never race again, he joins a forest fire and rescue unit to be trained as a firefighter, or else his air strip will be shut down.

name: Pele: Birth of a Legend
summary_text: Pele's meteoric rise from the slums of Sao Paulo to leading Brazil to its first World Cup victory at the age of 17 is chronicled in this biographical drama.

name: Joe Kidd
summary_text: An ex-bounty hunter reluctantly helps a wealthy landowner and his henchmen track down a Mexican revolutionary leader.

name: Trade
summary_text: Adriana, 13, is kidnapped in Mexico City by Russian sex traffickers. Her criminal 17 y.o. brother starts looking for her. Across the border in Texas, he gets help from a cop.

name: Monkeybone
summary_text: In a coma, a cartoonist finds himself trapped within his own underground creation and must find a way to get back, while racing against his popular but treacherous character, Monkeybone.

name: Seconds
summary_text: An unhappy middle-aged banker agrees to a procedure that will fake his death and give him a completely new look and identity - one that comes with its own price.

name: Baise-moi
summary_text: Two young women, marginalised by society, go on a destructive tour of sex and violence. Breaking norms and killing men - and shattering the complacency of polite cinema audiences.

name: Force 10 from Navarone
summary_text: During World War II, several oddly assorted military experts are teamed in a mission to raid and destroy a bridge vital to enemy strategy.

name: Maurice
summary_text: After his lover rejects him, a young man trapped by the oppressiveness of Edwardian society tries to come to terms with and accept his sexuality.

name: Out Cold
summary_text: A snowboarder's plans for his own snowboard park go awry when an ex-girlfriend returns to town.

name: The Ex
summary_text: A slacker is forced to work for his father-in-law after his pregnant wife steps away from her high-paying job.

name: Fire Down Below
summary_text: A federal agent uncovers lucrative toxic waste dumps in Appalachia and must deal with the locals who want to keep their 'gold mine' secret.

name: Hababam Sinifi Tatilde
summary_text: Hababam Sinifi (The Chaos Class) continue to their adventures. Now first female students of the school history joins to the class and all Hababam Sinifi fight each other for them at first ...                See full summary »

name: Renaissance Man
summary_text: A failed businessman is hired by the army to teach a group of underachieving recruits in order to help them pass basic training.

name: Don't Think Twice
summary_text: When a member of a popular New York City improv troupe gets a huge break, the rest of the group - all best friends - start to realize that not everyone is going to make it after all.

name: The Villain
summary_text: When his wife becomes the latest victim of a serial killer, Guru blurs the line between good and evil in his pursuit of revenge.

name: 13 Tzameti
summary_text: A man takes over a dead man's task without realizing the horror it entails.

name: Castaway on the Moon
summary_text: A failed suicide attempt leads a heartbroken man to live a life in the wilderness.

name: Nayakan
summary_text: A common man's struggles against a corrupt police force put him on the wrong side of the law. He becomes a don, who is loved and respected by many, but his growing power and influence exact a heavy toll.

name: Serving Sara
summary_text: A process server tries to serve an elusive female target.

name: Surveillance
summary_text: Two FBI agents attempt to clarify the murders occurring in a desolate region. They approach the witnesses of the latest incident with the help of the local police. All of them hide something and all have wildly different stories to tell.

name: The Man Who Killed Don Quixote
summary_text: Toby, a disillusioned film director, is pulled into a world of time-jumping fantasy when a Spanish cobbler believes himself to be Sancho Panza. He gradually becomes unable to tell dreams from reality.

name: Showdown in Little Tokyo
summary_text: Two L.A. cops with opposing views on what is the best way to uphold the law have to work together to bring down the Yakuza, while trying to protect a beautiful woman.

name: Pledge This!
summary_text: At South Beach University, a beautiful sorority president takes in a group of unconventional freshman girls seeking acceptance into her house.

name: Student of the Year 2
summary_text: A student must face off against bullies and overcome hurdles, both academic and romantic, to win his college's coveted Student of the Year trophy.

name: The Crush
summary_text: A journalist becomes the unwanted center of attention for a 14-year-old girl, who proceeds to sabotage his life after he refuses her sexual advances.

name: Steamboy
summary_text: In 1860s Britain, a boy inventor finds himself caught in the middle of a deadly conflict over a revolutionary advance in steam power.

name: The Bear
summary_text: An orphan bear cub hooks up with an adult male as they try to dodge human hunters.

name: Casino Jack
summary_text: A hot shot Washington DC lobbyist and his protégé go down hard as their schemes to peddle influence lead to corruption and murder.

name: Descendants
summary_text: The teenage son of the king and queen of Auradon offers the trouble-making children of villains a chance to attend prep school in the kingdom.

name: Southern Comfort
summary_text: During a routine exercise, a team of National Guards are threatened by angry and violent locals.

name: The Cotton Club
summary_text: Meet the jazz musicians, dancers, owner and guests (e.g. gangster Dutch Schultz) of The Cotton Club in 1928-30s Harlem.

name: Eddie Murphy: Delirious
summary_text: Eddie Murphy's raunchy, raucous stand-up comedy routine is captured for posterity on this tape.

name: The Edge of Love
summary_text: Two feisty, free-spirited women are connected by the brilliant, charismatic poet who loves them both.

name: Onibaba
summary_text: Two women kill samurais and sell their belongings for a living. While one of them is having an affair with their neighbor, the other woman meets a mysterious samurai wearing a bizarre mask.

name: Haunter
summary_text: A teenager is stuck in a time loop that is not quite the same each time. She must uncover the truth but her actions have consequences for herself and others.

name: Air Bud
summary_text: An unexpected player joins the school basketball team - a circus dog who escaped from a cruel master.

name: The Mirror Has Two Faces
summary_text: A shy, middle-aged professor enters into a romantic but non-physical relationship with an unlucky-in-love colleague.

name: Metallica Through the Never
summary_text: Trip, a young roadie for Metallica, is sent on an urgent mission during the band's show. But what seems like a simple assignment turns into a surreal adventure.

name: Le placard
summary_text: A man spreads the rumor of his fake homosexuality with the aid of his neighbor, to prevent his imminent firing at his work.

name: Taps
summary_text: Military cadets take extreme measures to ensure the future of their academy when its existence is threatened by local condo developers.

name: A Boy and His Dog
summary_text: A young man and his telepathic dog wander a post-apocalyptic wasteland.

name: Maudie
summary_text: An arthritic Nova Scotia woman works as a housekeeper while she hones her skills as an artist and eventually becomes a beloved figure in the community.

name: Private Life
summary_text: An author is undergoing multiple fertility therapies to get pregnant, putting her relationship with her husband on edge.

name: Assassination Games
summary_text: Two assassins agree to work together as one tries to avenge his wife and the other collect a reward for a job.

name: Catch .44
summary_text: 3 women are sent to intercept a major drug deal at a diner at 3 AM and get the money. Simple - save for Murphy's law: Anything that can go wrong will go wrong.

name: Flesh+Blood
summary_text: In medieval Europe, a young girl from a noble family is obsessed with her captors - commoners.

name: Wendy and Lucy
summary_text: Over the summer, a series of unfortunate happening triggers a financial crisis for a young woman and she soon finds her life falling apart.

name: Synchronic
summary_text: Two New Orleans paramedics' lives are ripped apart after they encounter a series of horrific deaths linked to a designer drug with bizarre, otherworldly effects.

name: Close-Up
summary_text: The true story of Hossain Sabzian, a cinephile who impersonated the director Mohsen Makhmalbaf to convince a family they would star in his so-called new film.

name: Art School Confidential
summary_text: Starting from childhood attempts at illustration, the protagonist pursues his true obsession to art school. But as he learns how the art world really works, he finds that he must adapt his vision to the reality that confronts him.
